title: Compound with highest BP based on Lewis structures

content.question: Based on the information in the table above, which of the compounds has the highest boiling point, and why?

choices.label: Butanal, because it can form intermolecular hydrogen bonds
Pentane, because it has the longest carbon chain
Pentane, because it has the most Câˆ’H bonds
Propanoic acid, because it can form intermolecular hydrogen bonds

content.answer: Propanoic acid, because it can form intermolecular hydrogen bonds

skill.text: 4.C: Explain the connection between particulate-level and macroscopic properties of a substance using models and representations.
